scripts.remotion:render:input: remotion render remotion/index.ts InputBackground public/backgrounds/input-bg.mp4 --codec h264
scripts.remotion:render:results: remotion render remotion/index.ts ResultsBackground public/backgrounds/results-bg.mp4 --codec h264
scripts.remotion:render:all: npm run remotion:render:input && npm run remotion:render:results
